history.proof: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec b c). - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: Rmax_left, Rmax_right, Rmult_le_compat_l. - hauto use: Rmult_le_reg_l, Rmult_comm, Rmult_0_r unfold: Rle inv: sumbool.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rmax_left (Rmax _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a r : b <= c Unable to unify "if Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) then a * c else a * b" with "a * c".

In environment a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a r : b <= c Unable to unify "0 <= a" with "a * c = (if Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) then a * c else a * b)".

original: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec b c). - rewrite Rmax_left. + rewrite Rmax_left. * reflexivity. * apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. + apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. - rewrite Rmax_right. + rewrite Rmax_right. * reflexivity. * apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. + apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H.
